website_summaries.verdict: Designed for comfort and flexibility for technological use in multiple environments.
pros: Customers love the range of use this backpack has, fitting comfortably with in many contexts be it in a boardroom or the great outdoors
We love it can attach to a suitcase as well
High marks for the handsome design and color options
cons: Some report that the material doesn't hold up over time

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking backpack, and it fits my 15 inch laptop (though just barely). However, within the first 3 days of use, a zipper on one of the inside mesh pockets came off. I went to go zip the pocket up, and the zipper just slid right off the end. Probably won't buy from MarsBro again. I can tell the manufacturing is fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: creatively speaking

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack. I can fit my 17" Mac Book ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. I can fit my 17" Mac Book Pro in it just fine. I love the deep side pockets for my cell phone, a drink, or an umbrella. I commute by train to Boston every day and I love the tiny zippered pocket on the strap for my Charlie card (train card) and my work badge. It's easy to get it in/out especially in crowds of commuters. The padded mesh is really comfortable on my back too.
customer_reviews.author: KB41

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for commuting
customer_reviews.text: It has comfortable straps, and there's a little ID pocket in the strap so you can scan transportation cards without having to pull out a wallet. The inside has a couple of pockets, a space for a power bank (which you can access through a port from outside the backpack) and a nicely padded laptop compartment. There are a couple of well-divided pockets on the outside, and two pockets on the sides large enough to fit a pretty thick water bottle. There's also a little pocket on the back that rests against your back when you're wearing it. I use that to store valuables when I have to stand on the train.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie B Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag everyday for a month. I've carried a laptop in it and other random odds and ends of a commuting adult. I was a bit concerned that it would be cheap or fall apart. I know a month is not a long time for wear on a backpack, but I don't have any complaints at this time. Pros: Tons of pockets Waterproof, though I haven't been in heavy rain Lightweight Cute Cons: Once, in the first few days of having this bag, I went to zip it while it was overfull and the zipper split. I unzipped it and adjusted the contents and the zipper has been fine ever since.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Business Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and was looking for a business bag to carry my laptop in. The current laptop bag I had was heavy, and bulky and a pain to take on planes. This MarsBro Laptop Backpack is great! It looks small at first glance, but it actually fits my computer (13in), mouse, charging cord, business cards, pens, etc with plenty of room to spare! It is light-weight and doesn't hurt my shoulder as previous bag did, even when full with stuff! The color is great. I got the purple and it's subtle enough to still look business, but stands out enough against traditional backpacks. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Carroccio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but doesn't hold up **Helpful Sellers**
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bag with great pockets and organization. However, I've only used this for 2 trips and the zipper is already tearing at the seam and it's not as large as I had anticipated. **Edited to add that the seller reached out and has been very helpful in resolving my issues!
customer_reviews.author: kdub9

customer_reviews.title: Padding galore.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. I bought this after a messenger bag made me cry at an airport because my shoulder/back hurt so much. Do I look like a high-schooler? Probably. Do I care? No, because this thing is super padded. The back and straps have tons of cushioning. I like the subtle gray and the sleek design - keeps it from looking too bulky and academic. Great value, good zippers.
customer_reviews.author: pugsnbourbon

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, and stunning color.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this backpack. The color is awesome. It has a lot of pockets and places to store things. I only gave 4 stars because the USB connector isn't for fast charging, it is slow. I just zipped the bag closed and ran my power cord through the zipper when I was using it so I could have fast charging. It's not the end of the world, but part of why I picked this backpack was because of the charging port. Backpack seems durable, I have used for a few weekends of traveling so far. It is very comfortable and the pocket on the straps has been great for keeping bus/train cards within easy and quick reach.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and like the color
customer_reviews.text: My friend got this backpack and i really liked it so i purchased one for work to hold my laptop (i was using a shoulder tote prior). It's very, very well padded on the shoulder straps and so is the backing of it and the laptop compartment. However, this makes it seem as if there's not enough room inside and not very expandable. Love the pockets to fit water bottle on the sides. My recommendation for an upgrade on this backpack is to create more space like depth and include the straps that help tighten the backpack for bulging out too much. I haven't traveled with it yet, but overall, good backpack and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: I take this to work everyday and it has definitely been a great help! I fit my Microsoft Surface Pro
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after Christmas, a month later, still going strong! I take this to work everyday and it has definitely been a great help! I fit my Microsoft Surface Pro, portfolio, 8 x 11 appointment book, phone and tablet chargers, extra set of clothes, toiletries, waterbottle, EVERYTHING, and there's still room! Durable, lots of pockets and zippers for organization, love the look and comfort, would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: minahoneyfresh

customer_reviews.title: A dream travel backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is my dream travel backpack! It can hold a laptop of significant size or an iPad plus a bunch of convenient pockets. You can put a full-size bottle of water in the side pockets and the strap on the back lets you slide it right over your carry-on luggage handle with ease. It also keeps its shape well and doesn’t get too floppy. I walked with it in the rain for a bit and the water beaded right off. A great bag, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but comes unzipped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to travel because it had the ports for charging and earbuds. It is decent quality overall and a beautiful shade of purple, HOWEVER, the top zipper does not stay zipped, and as a result your laptop could fall out, even with the strap that is meant to hold it in. The zipper randomly comes ALL THE WAY unzipped, splaying you're belongings everywhere. Also the front pocket (middle pocket) barely holds anything. 🥺
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Corby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Sturdy, Adult Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shimmery backpack! Im in my 30s and going back to school so i wanted a mature but pretty bag. (My 9 year old is very jealous and wants to switch her lands end for mine lol) Seems sturdy and has nicely padded laptop, tablet pockets and shoulder straps. The cord to charge my phone doesnt work unfortunately, the main zipper is slightly sticky, and the laptop velcro strap doesnt fit over my 13" laptop but im keeping it anyway because i really need it and everything else seems great. Love the hidden pocket in the back and the deep water bottle pockets!
customer_reviews.author: S. Reisner

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for daily work/school commute
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy and the padding on the back makes it comfortable even when carrying many items. Each part of the bag has numerous pockets for large and small items. I commute to work via public transportation and my bag never looks dirty despite touching the floor of trains and buses. I would caution that the dual zipper on the largest part is pretty great HOWEVER be sure to zip all the way down to either the right or left side. If there are many items in the bag, zipping at the top will cause the bag to open all the way down and items could fall out. Other than that I really like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rhae

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this book bag
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this book bag, however, after about 2-3 months of use (2 days a week) the strap at the top of the bag ripped off. I also don’t recommended this book bag if you want to put drinks in the side pockets.. they’re too narrow. Otherwise, it’s a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Backpack for work travelers
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I travel for work, and wanted a laptop bag with the strap that holds it onto the roller suitcase. Very few laptop backpacks have that. I tried another bag that is more the briefcase style and hated it. I just took my first trip with this one and it was great. It has a slim enough profile to look like a grownup, but good space and outside pockets so my travel “things” (cords, earbuds, phone, wallet) have convenient spaces to stash easily. Really my only complaint is that I don’t love the fabric, but a couple people in the airport complimented me on it, so I think I can learn to love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Leydig Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Small Lite Backpack - Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had product for a week. Product was exactly what was expected. I read other reviews that it came damaged or the material was coming apart, but this was not the case with the product I received. There was some string coming loose but I just cut it and burned the ends so it wouldn't fray anymore. Only Con: The shoulder straps are a little close together so it rubbed against my neck when I was riding my bike. Computer size: 15.6 inch, the strap (inside to secure the laptop) will cover it and reach the Velcro on the inside but it has to be stretched to do so. I am sure after some use it will stretch permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother if you're using it for large textbooks
customer_reviews.text: Water resistance wore off quickly. I have never washed this backpack and within 2 months it was done. The seems are ripping at the padded handle on top and the seems from the zipper have split where the main compartment closes. I'm super disappointed because the green color was beautiful and the material felt as if it would be super durable... not the case. Don't put more than 2 textbooks in this bags (15 pounds) because it's not going to hold long.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Would be almost perfect with one addition.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It's comfortable and I love the color. I would prefer it if the large compartment was split into two. As it is, my laptop is lumped in with most of my other stuff, whereas it would be more convenient and easier to manage if the laptop had its own pocket and all the rest of my larger items could be separate.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Girard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable backpack
customer_reviews.text: this was very comfortable to wear. I liked the different sizes and types of pockets inside both zippered compartments. The only part I didn't like was the pocket on the back. While it was a good size, there was no way to close it. I was planning on putting my passport and money in this section, figuring it would be safer since it would be next to my back. But with no zipper or Velcro, I didn't feel confident that the items would be secure.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is made well and overall a great purchase for the price! HOWEVER! This backpack is shiny! The material it uses is not a matte fabric one might expect. It still looks fine, but it is literally flashier than some of the other tech backpacks. For me, this is a deal breaker. Also the water bottle pockets dont stretch and are very skinny. I had to buy a smaller bottle because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Antony P

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to go on 4 years with this backpack and it still looks like I got it yesterday. It is durable and water-resistant every time I have to walk in the rain to get to class. The only thing I would have to say about this is I wish the zippers didn't go down to the bottom of the backpack, I have had some times in the past that it would open up, but I found a way to prevent that since. (I just close the zippers to the side to prevent the top from opening) Other than that hiccup I love this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Camo

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I have many backpacks for traveling, teaching, etc. and this is by far my favorite purchase. I bought it for my trip to London because of the hidden zipper and did not regret it. Not only did it hold so many things, it held up in the London rain and wind keeping everything inside dry. It fit comfortably and did not cause me back pain as many other bags have. I have already recommended this purchase to other friends who are traveling soon and students preparing for college.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for college. I've had it now for 2 months and I love it! It holds everything I need and is very comfortable to wear with all the padding and durability. It has an nice padded pocket with velcro strap I use for my Macbook and it has so many different pockets for for all the smaller things like pencils, earbuds, calculator, etc. The built in USB port with cable is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack if all you're going to carry is your tablet, labtop and their cables. If you are going to actually put anything in it don't bother. It's half the size of Matein's nearly identical style backpack also designed for a 15.6" laptop Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Secret pocket doesn’t zip shut
customer_reviews.text: It’s great as a minimalist backpack, reminds me of the basic Jansport black backpacks. My only personal downside is that the “hidden” pocket on the bottom back is open and not able to zip shut which is a deal breaker for me. I tend to put extra money and my passport back there but not if it doesn’t zip.
customer_reviews.author: nikimc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Great quality. Holds up to abuse of travel
customer_reviews.text: Took this bag all over Asia and LOVED IT! Very versatile. Stood up well to flights and travel. Still looks brand new! Love the internal battery pocket. Holds the largest battery legal to carry on a plane, 26800mAh. We used this one and its' perfect:  SUPER SUPER Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for School. I bought it because I needed one that would hold my laptop. I have a ASUS 15.6" screen and the strap to hold it in is stretched to the max when loaded. I love the pockets It has many pockets, I love all the pockets. It seems to be standing up, because my kids have moved and pulled this backpack and it still not coming out the seems.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL G MIRAMONTES

customer_reviews.title: solid backpack
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new backpack for work and found this. I love it and thought about getting another one for travel. Plenty of pockets. Only concern is you have to make sure the zipper is all the way to one side or the other. If the zipper is at the top and the bag is heavy gravity with open the backpack. Otherwise great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bremk13

customer_reviews.title: Durable, zippers work great
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for almost a year and it is great quality. I am a teacher and I pack it full each night. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: There’s better out there, but for the cost, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this backpack for almost 6 months. While useful, it’s already falling apart. The black loop handle on the top ripped halfway off within a month or 2, so I cut the rest off. The fabric where those were “secured” is also ripped and getting larger. Not to a point of not fictional, yet, but irritating none the less. Otherwise, the separate Velcro secured pocket for your laptop/tablet is nice. Extra pockets everywhere for the organization freak. I use it work and travel (as my carryon personal item) and it does the job. Looking for something a bit more durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack! Pretty sturdy for a medium sized load ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack! Pretty sturdy for a medium sized load for school. I would not want to fill it too full though or put super heavy textbooks in here though. Might stress the straps too much. But a great buy for those whose work is on their laptops or Tablets. A lot of space and room for gadgets, cords and knickknacks. LOVE <3
customer_reviews.author: Katie C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Quality so gewd.  Mash room!
customer_reviews.text: Zippers on point. Girlfriend loves the sound it makes. She’s starting a band now using just the backpack zippers alone. She has a record deal already. It fits all her items including her record deal contract. Laptop pocket has padding. Much good. Also, it holds a water bottle so she can stay hydrated. Wine colored so if you spill wine it doesn’t matter. Just use this waterproof backpack to clean it up. It goes on your back like normal backpacks but this one is specifically designed for your back. Good for items that usually go in backpacks. Lastly, she owned it for two days and it’s still intact. It’s an intact backpack. So, five stars for being dope!
customer_reviews.author: jared mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack looks very well made and I love it! It was my fault I didn’t get a larger one Bc my laptop is exactly 15.6” so I wasn’t able to put the straps over my laptop, but I don’t think it will be an issue. Shipping was super fast also. Very well appreciated! Highly recommend Update: after a few months of using the backpack, it has held up really well and the charge cord makes it really convenient when I don't have a place to charge my phone. Also, the little secret compartments come in handy when I need to store some money.
customer_reviews.author: Haiau

customer_reviews.title: SO MANY POCKETS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fantastic backpack I've ever owned! There are SO MANY pockets and it's nice and spacious on the inside. I've found the key clip in the front part exceptionally convenient, I never have to dig for my keys! I haven't tried the USB function, and I haven't had it in the rain yet, but it's very sturdy and comfortable to wear. The purple is a beautiful shade as well. Absolutely thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack for work and this fits the bill. It very well made and has a ton of pockets and space i can fit all my work things plus workout clothes for the morning. I've also used it as an overnight bag. It is very comfortable to wear and holds up in the rain. I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lanae

customer_reviews.title: Not as water resistant as you’d think. And zippers
customer_reviews.text: Nice design , the only problem is when I put more than a few notebooks and a book by the time I get to class the weight has pulled the zippers apart and the backpack is completely open.... like everything falling out....happened more than 3 times so I snap the two ends together with a clip... annoying but it works... and with barely any rain the front had soaked and cold water bottles the condensation soaked through the pocket inside.
customer_reviews.author: C Azevedo Livestock

customer_reviews.title: but I would not recommend this for college students unless you're only taking one ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute backpack, but I would not recommend this for college students unless you're only taking one class. It's not very high capacity and is pretty full with not much room leftover with just one 1 1/2" binder, a textbook, and the power cube I got. will probably look for something similar that's bigger or just pull out my old Navy backpack that I can fit my entire life in.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, awesome back pack.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this backpack. It is comfortable to wear and easy to put on and take off. The laptop sleeve fits my laptop as it was described, and more than enough room for my books/notepads and folders for school.I also really like the charging port. The USB inside the bag plugs into my external battery and I plug my lightning cord into the plastic USB port on the exterior and to my phone, and bada bing bada boom, my phone is charging. Light weight, great backpack
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie J. McNutt

customer_reviews.title: I love the secret compartments in the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love the secret compartments in the backpack. It looks like very good quality and OMG it is so cute. I can image putting my class books inside of this bag and since it's not bulky I won't overstuff my backpack! What a relief. And it has padding on the back so my back will feel comfortable! I really do like this. After this year, I just might purchase the purple one depending on how it holds up. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: shanita w.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, our only real issue is how easy the ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the feel/look of the bag. Works great, our only real issue is how easy the inlayed cable's shielding ripped off (the black shielding, not the individual inner wires) Could be braided to match the interior and to add durability to something that's going to be tugged on and moved a lot.
customer_reviews.author: r3p1c

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fact that the zippers hide on the sides, but not really much protection for the 2 zippers on the front of the backpack. It's completely not waterproof. Had to walk on the rain with it and all my electronic devices on the backpack got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality bag at
customer_reviews.text: Hanger broke off within a few months, other areas are already frayed. Not a good quality bag at all
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom08

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BACKPACK EVER! I have a back injury and needed a backpack for classes that wouldn't aggregate it. This backpack has the perfect amount of padding and structure. I can keep my cards in reach on the strap without having to take the bag off and on over and over. My one criticism is that the pocket in the back for your wallet isn't secure. (My sister was able to get into it while I was wearing it) It would benefit from a velcro closer or a hidden zipper. Outside of that I will only buy this bag in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Color exactly as pictured, comfortable with plenty of pocket space, and the laptop strap is perfect for my Lenovo. I had it out in the rain for the first time today and had no issues with my things getting wet. I'm a grad student so the amount of things I have to haul around is impressive and this bag manages them all and still looks cute and fashionable. I DO wish the pockets on the sides were a bit larger - they hold my umbrella really well, but my waterbottle is left out in the cold. So I'm now either forced to carry it, or get a new, smaller waterbottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Underpriced. Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Don’t hesitate to buy this bag. This is a sturdy, subdued (adult) berry-colored purple bag. The straps are substantial, padded & comfy. Lots of pockets for stashing away keys, wallet & pens. This bag is worth way more than it costs. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dinky Woodstock

customer_reviews.title: Good, but too darn shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I truly like the overall design of the backpack, but it is a lot shinier (polyester) than photos portrayed. If you don't mind, then it's an awesome bag.
customer_reviews.author: C. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is well padded, comfortable, has lots of pockets and storage. I just returned from long travels, and it was such a relief not to have to carry a heavy laptop bag. This is one of the best purchases I've made! Pretty, too!
customer_reviews.author: Linnea

customer_reviews.title: Durability is subpar
customer_reviews.text: The water resistance was nice I didn’t even make it through my trip before it ripped and fell apart. I loved the idea. Loved the style but it ripped at the seam in my first use. Downside is I bought it for a trip a couple months before. Didn’t bother to test it out, and couldn’t return it by the time I got back from the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag on April 9th, and began using it immediately. Even though it says that it fits laptops under 17", it is a tight fit around the corners. After only about two weeks, the mesh/webbing on the straps has started to separate from the fabric. I understand that "you get what you pay for" however, I thought this bag would last a few months. I see that it is eligible for return until May 9th, I don't foresee myself having time to go through that process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: As a college student and frequent traveler I have been through many bags but I LOVE this thing! The pocket for ID's within the strap is genius, I use it all the time when traveling. It's spacious and very comfy. The waterproof outside looks sleek and is sturdy and keeps your laptop/things well protected. Plus I'm often asked where I got it, it's a very good looking backpack! Great buy...especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: underwhelmed. did not meet design expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my size 12 shoes. Otherwise, it seems more than nice enough for 30 bucks. Looking for something like this and you're a US Men's size 10 or less, buy it now. Also, fwiw, the shoe compartment is "loose" in the interior of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this school bag!! I just received it yesterday so this review is basically just on appearance and storage. I needed a good back pack for work, so based on the reviews I decided on this one. It is the prettiest purple but not to girlie, I think I counted atleast 15 different pockets but there could be more, the only one complaint I have is I wasted to much money on back packs in the past before this beauty came into my life 😬😬😬😬
customer_reviews.author: Cjb12206

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I just received my purple MarsBro backpack, and let me tell you, I am in love!!! The color is beautiful, there are tons of convient pockets all over (the inside, which is another plus). It’s slim, but that’s exactly what I wanted. It seems durable and I intend on using it for light loads (purse alternative). I don’t really think I’d recommend it for heavy school loads. I could see that leading to wear sooner. But for day to day commuting, it’s perfect! If your looking for something similar to what I was, I definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amber-Sky Larkin

customer_reviews.title: So many pockets!
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets! I purchased this for a specific trip and couldn't be happier. I love the small pocket on the shoulder strap - it was perfect for keeping my ID and credit card within easy reach. I love the ability to hook up a portable charger and used it frequently throughout the trip without issue. I love all the compartments. The zippers move nicely. I found no quality issues. I really love this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Midge

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it had a lot of pockets and a strap for traveling to hang over your suitcase. However, I only had the backpack for a couple of months before the pocket started ripping where the zipper is, so I was unable to use the pocket, otherwise items would fall out of the backpack. I ended up having to buy a different backpack in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in, love it so far, will update on wear later. Came in a really nice plastic bag. Tons of pockets Has a pocket in the back that doesn't cup but is still really nice to have. Has a pocket on one of the shoulder straps for easy access to id cards or keys
customer_reviews.author: jjcc

customer_reviews.title: zippers wont stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for school (college) to fit my books and laptop. mainly i got it for the laptop to stay safe. while walking through campus on multiple occasions my bag will unzip on its own. This is not safe or Sucre for my stuff. The straps also slip to the longest length, so i have given up on adjusting them to the right length.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Saucy backpack.
customer_reviews.text: So far this back pack has been AWESOME! The zipper is hidden against your back so no one can get to your goodies in the main pocket. It is also very stylish. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight bag
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, holds my rain gear(umbrella & rain suit), one kindle & 2 notebooks for class. I clipped my lunch bag to it. With no textbooks to weight it down, it still ripped above one of should straps.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia G Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent back pack. Second time buying it for my daughter and she loves using it for school. First one I bought still in excellent condition, just want her to have another one for the new school year! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Practical, and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic backpack! I've been using this to carry my computer to work for a few weeks now. I keep my travel mug on one side and my umbrella on the other, both are easy to reach while I'm walking. The laptop padding is great and my 15.6" laptop fits perfectly! The pockets are well designed and the padding is really comfortable. The fabric is really high quality. I love the subtle color variations in the purple, and the water resistance. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcellie

customer_reviews.title: 100% happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I just dragged this backpack all over China on an 18-day tour. It handled everything flawlessly. It still looks brand new. It has useful pockets and internal areas that work very well. Please note that the fabric is a bit shiny -- it has a gold thread through it, not a problem for me, but you can't tell this from the pictures. Anyway, it is a great backpack and very durable. I am 100% happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn’t stay closed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this bag but the zipper doesn’t stay closed and I’ve almost lost my purse due to that. I had to buy a safety clip because there is zero help from the zippers so I don’t lose my stuff smh
customer_reviews.author: Me2019

customer_reviews.title: Useless after 6 months, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t last but 6 months before the zipper tore away from the bag rendering it useless. Save your money and find something that really is “durable” to last for the entire school year.
customer_reviews.author: Poppet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! And it matches my hair! I'm so grateful to find a backpack that isn't just black. So far it's been a great change from a regular purse especially for all the shows I do, locally and travel for. I really just wish it would stand up straight on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is exactly as described and super comfortable. I have had problems with backpacks in ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is exactly as described and super comfortable. I have had problems with backpacks in the past where for some strange reason, they get very heavy without that many items in it. I pack this bag full of things and it doesn't feel disproportionately heavy (if that makes sense?). Anyway, I love the color as well and it's got pockets on pockets. It's a great find an I think great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mont

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a college student!
customer_reviews.text: I can fit everything I need in this bag, and the multiple pockets help me stay organized. It's very comfortable too. The price had me worried that it was gonna be cheap material, but it's just a really good deal. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: ec.bgb

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag that became everyday bag
customer_reviews.text: Took it travelling to Italy for a month and loved the extra security features. The double drink holders are a good size and fit a small umbrella and a hydroflask or thermos. I liked it enough that it became my everyday backpack to work. My tiny complaint would be regarding the pocket on the back (which I love and use daily)- just wish it had velcro so it would feel more secure. Besides that, I really like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dafne

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!!!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is seriously great. It has a million pockets and holds a bunch of stuff. I love all the safety features, hidden zippers for the main pocket and tear/scratch resistant. Color is beautiful. Only thing is I wish the water bottle pockets on the sides were made with stretchy material so it's easier to fit a bulky bottle in there. But definitely, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for airplane carry on. Love it for everyday use as well
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. Perfect for traveling. In fact, I use it everyday for work to carry around my 12 inch MacBook and 12 inch iPad Pro. They each fit very nicely in 2 separate pockets inside and still more room for anything else. When using it as a carry on when flying, it fits very nicely under the seat. Very good quality. I’ve been using it every day for about 2 months now and it’s holding up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: So far so great!!! I've had this backpack for about 4 mouths now & I have to say it is great. There are pockets all over, hidden compartments. The durability is awesome!!! I use it during the week to carry my work laptop, notebook and raincoat along with smaller items in the many pockets.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Backpack
customer_reviews.text: For context, I coach college debate. This backpack replaced my old one I had for nearly a decade. This fits my laptop and an entire package of 8.5 by 14 paper in the cushioned laptop section easily. There are plenty of pockets to store my pens, kindle, flash drives, and any number of snacks. The USB port that connects to the inside of the bag is perfect. The weight distributes well and my shoulders and back did not hurt at all by the end of the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Massarelli

customer_reviews.title: I've used this only but love the looks
customer_reviews.text: It is very good looking. Roomy enough for a 16" laptop and more items. Have only used it twice, but it feels like a good quality for the price. I bought it in the burgundy/black. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kosmicki

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's been perfect for business travel. Easily fits my laptop, portfolio, planner, change of shoes AND more! Great color and shoulder straps are nicely padded.
customer_reviews.author: ribbit12

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The straps are super comfortable and it's way nicer carrying my work laptop in this rather than the laptop shoulder bag I was provided with by my place of employment.
customer_reviews.author: sandyjean

customer_reviews.title: but I love the quality and number of compartments
customer_reviews.text: I haven't travelled with this bag yet, but I love the quality and number of compartments. I have a small frame, and this is perfect on my back. I probably looked at 50 bags priced $50-150 before settling on this one, and I have to say I think it's better than those other bags. You also can't beat the price. I'm looking forward to taking it to Europe later this month.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: this backpack I am in love with. It does protect the laptop beside it ...
customer_reviews.text: I always dissatisfied with a backpack made for laptops due to it looking HUGE on me. However, this backpack I am in love with. It does protect the laptop beside it size in the picture and it is quite fashionable. However, WARNING! There are few awkward places of pockets, but I can live with it. ​
customer_reviews.author: Melanie F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish it held up better
customer_reviews.text: This backpack really was everything I was looking for. Needed something a little on the smaller side to fit a few work documents, Surface Pro, water bottle, umbrella, miscellaneous cords and other small things. It looks more professional than a lot of backpacks, and the color is awesome. That said, I'm not thrilled with the build quality. I've been using it for just under 2 months, usually 4-5 days per week, and some of the seams have started ripping already. Now I'm left with the decision... Buy another and just consider them "disposable" or find something else that might last better but probably won't be as close to what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love it, got it within few hours of ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, got it within few hours of ordering too... first time experience. Very durable, and of good quality. The shoulder straps seem a bit wide for me, but it's to help distribute weight of the backpack. Money well spent i'd say.
customer_reviews.author: Bunmi

customer_reviews.title: Great light backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on vacation. Worked well on plane, train, and bus. Used as Anker battery with the external USB connection and worked well. Carried tablet, snacks, jacket, and umbrella plus paperwork. Plenty of pockets and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: PCMASTER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality laptop backpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife, as she needed a laptop backpack. This is very good quality, pretty sturdy and more spacious than expected. It's a plus that she also loves its green color.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Great number of compartments
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack a few months ago, and I love it. I use it instead of a purse and to haul books around. It looks nice enough that it's appropriate to wear to all but the fanciest events. I really love the number of compartments it has. There's a place to put everything. There is also usb cord that I haven't used, but it's cool that it's there. The backpack is vey nice and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Late Review...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The product came on time and was in a plastic bag placed in a box.The quality is not bad and the design is fantastic! It's light and comfortable to have on with very decent/many pockets for your average business/school needs. I am currently using it as a business backpack holding books and other documents. (I have not tried the charging cord yet but I'm sure it works.) I just need to buy a portable charger for it now and equip it. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Fits HP spectre x360 15
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Fits HP spectre x360 15.6 (late 2017) in a sleeve with a few notebooks and big headphones while still zipping nicely. There isn't a ton of room but the bag is sexy and carries essentials
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - torn within 4 months
customer_reviews.text: In the first month and a half the inner seam started to rip and I could see the styrofoam insert. I purchased this in September. It is now Dec 20 and the outer seam is starting to tear. I can see the inside of the bag from the outside. Not a good purchase for school or travel.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack. Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. Lots of room, comfortable on your back, and the luggage strap came in handy! The charging port on the side was nice and holds the phone in the pocket below.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Keller

customer_reviews.title: Solid entry level affordablackpack.
customer_reviews.text: Good, functional design. Have used it every day for 3 months, but stitching on top handle is starting to rip off. Everything else has been useful for me, packing snacks, laptop, small toiletries, gym clothes in bottom pouch. **1 month later** Ok the stitching on the sides are starting to pop. Bag kinda stinks. Won't stop talking about my mama. Reduced to 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Best. Day. Backpack. Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Backpack. Ever!!! Holds a ton of stuff - 15” laptop, 10” tablet, all purse contents and meds & jewelry. I use in air travel (fits under seat) and daily commuting. Very comfortable unlike my 25 other backpacks (no exaggeration). Love love love!! Looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: This backpack so far has been wonderful. I've had it a few months
customer_reviews.text: This backpack so far has been wonderful. I've had it a few months. It's very strong, the padded shoulder straps are extremely comfortable, and the fabric is water resistant. It's everything I needed. I only subtract one star as the compartments are a little small, but otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Nice but almost metallic
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice backpack for the price. I like all of the pockets that it has. That being said, The picture is not super accurate because it is really shiny, almost metallic and that is not evident in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD, Strap broke already.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even used it a full year at school and the strap broke!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It's a nice quality and comfortable to wear. The only downfall is the charging port kills your charge ability. I plugged my battery pack into the backpack port and then my phone to the outside and my phone said it I would take 7 hours to charge. My battery pack straight to my phone only takes 1hour to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for school about 2 months ago and it already has a hole on the inside and on the outside bottom part from the threading coming out. I love the backpack itself but it is very cheaply made. I definitely wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and I love the price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and I love the price!! It has cushion on the part that lays on your back which is very comfortable. The only thing I would change is the placement of the zipper to the main section. I think it would be better served if it were located in front of the top carrying handle. Other than that I like the quality and am very pleased with the item. Shipping was super fast and the packaging was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but did not fit my 17 inch laptop. Style and design is very nice but I suggest and is perfect for my smaller office laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: My favoutire backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a year now and is as good as new! I used it mostly for studding and now work, even when it rained the contents of the backpack where intact, thing that really surprised me! Thanks a lot for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Cian

customer_reviews.title: It's OK--fabric is subpar.
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on the main pouch are a little annoying, since it's kind of backwards how you usually use a backpack. The material is pretty cheap. I've only used it one day, so we'll see how it holds up. I wish the side pockets fit larger water bottles. Worth about $25-$30, but look elsewhere if you're looking for a better quality backpack.
customer_reviews.author: tay.t

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and great usability
customer_reviews.text: I can't bear to carry much around for school. This is much comfier than my old Jansport which had no support. Great for organizing and travel with many compartments. It does not expand as much as the Jansport though, so I'm slightly limited on what I can carry but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I love all the pockets and compartments especially the small one on the shoulder strap. Used for a work trip and a quick over night trip and was functional for both uses. Very light and doesn't make your back hot while carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: S Navarro

product_meta.title: MarsBro Laptop Backpack, Business Travel College Backpack with USB Charging Port Water Resistant Anti Theft 15.6 Inch Bag for Women Men Purple
feature_bullets: Durable Material and Large Capacity: 600D Innovative Shining anti-tearing Water Resistant Polyester. Dimensions - 18.7 x 12.4 x 7.7 inch, holds 15.6 inch as well as 15 inch, 14 inch and 13 inch Laptop/Macbook

Convenient Design: Includes External USB with built-in charging cable, card pocket on a strap and invisible rear storage pocket. Anti-Theft Hidden Zipper keeps your valuables safe (POWER BANK IS NOT INCLUDED)
Back Features: Rear Webbing can attach the backpack on suitcase. Weight balance design, breathable padded back panel, and S-Type shoulder straps provide ultra comfort experience
Multifunctional Pockets: Three main compartments and more than 13 functional pockets offer you particular space for laptop, iPad, iPhone, book, keys, pens, cards, wallet, bottle, clothes and more

Back to School Supplies: Ideal gifts for back to school / off to college /student / outdoor / Unisex Casual bookbags. And serve you well as professional office work bag, slim USB charging backpack, college high school big student backpack for boys, girls, teens, adults

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars695 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
